sentences.sContent: Rebels were already making plans to overthrow the government.
sentences.sCn: 反叛者已在密谋颠覆政府。

sentences.sContent: The organization was dedicated to the overthrow of capitalism.
sentences.sCn: 该组织致力于推翻资本主义。

remMethod.val: 来自词组throw over 摒弃

trans.tranOther: to remove a leader or government from power, especially by force
the defeat and removal from power of a leader or government, especially by force
